#summary About the Rest API of OpenMeetings

= Introduction =

For a detailed instruction which params and method can be used see [SoapMethods]. ALL methods that are implemented for the SOAP API are also available via REST.

= How to invoke Services via REST =

For example for the method getSession in the !UserService, you would use this URL via Rest:
http://demo.openmeetings.de/openmeetings/services/UserService/getSession
